channel.title: Changing the game type on easy rsc [solved lock please]
channel.description:
well, i hi-jacked peekays ::setgame command, added all the ints, voids, etc, however, easy rsc doesnt run from a world.xml such as peekay, sooo, i need to get the server to read it from Easyrsc.cfg, just like all the other settings, how would i do this?
EDIT: nvm i got it to work, with no help, man im awesome, lol jk, a mod can lock this thread.
